english: She stepped forward, and pressed the passive hand that lay upon the coverlet .
chinese: 她走向前来，紧握住那只伸在被单外面没有抗拒力量的手。

english: He turned up the collar of his top coat, with the other hand holding the attached case tightly .
chinese: 他翻上大衣领，另一只手紧紧握住那个皮包。

english: On her mother's silently pressing her hand with tender compassion, her small degree of fortitude was quite overcome .
chinese: 当母亲无言地、温柔地、同情地紧握住她的手时，她终于再也坚持不下去了。

english: Silverwind took a firm grasp of his axe
chinese: 银风紧握住斧柄（你、你、你要干嘛？ ） 。

english: His heavy hand took stephen s firmly . human eyes
chinese: 他用那厚实的手紧紧握住斯蒂芬的手。
紧握住造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: He pressed my hand warmly when we met
chinese: 我们见面时他紧握住我的手。

english: As i have given you my hand to hold
chinese: 就像我伸出手让你紧握住一样。

english: He seized my hand in his great clasp and nearly yanked it off
chinese: 他用他的那双大手紧紧握住我的手，差点没把我的手拽掉了。

english: I had once vowed that i would never call her aunt again : i thought it no sin to forget and break that vow now
chinese: 我曾发誓永远不再叫她舅妈。我想此刻忘却和违背自己的誓言并不是罪过。我紧握住她搁在被头外面的手。

english: That was exceedingly naughty of you , mr dedalus told her and pressed her hand indulgently . tempting poor simple males . miss douce of satin douced her arm away
chinese: “那你可太淘气36啦， ”迪达勒珀先生对她说，并放纵地紧握住她的手， “可怜的傻男人都给你迷住啦。 ”

english: " ah , m . morrel , " exclaimed the young seaman , with tears in his eyes , and grasping the owner s hand , " m . morrel , i thank you in the name of my father and of merc
chinese: “啊，莫雷尔先生， ”青年水手的眼睛里含着泪水，紧握住船主的手喊道“莫雷尔先生，我代表我父亲和美塞苔丝谢谢你了。 ”

english: Allie : when you ' ve done something that you can ' t take back , something that you don ' t understand , you start to hold tightly to the things you do understand , and you try to make sense out of everything you can
chinese: 当你做了你不能还原的事情，那些你不明白的事情，你开始紧握住你懂得的事情，尽你所能去了解一切。

english: Rest assured , gentlemen , that within three days , in a less time than justice would demand , the revenge i shall have taken for the murder of my child will be such as to make the boldest heart tremble ; " and as he spoke these words he ground his teeth , and grasped the old man s senseless hand
chinese: 放心吧，二位，在三天之内，司法机关所需的时间更短，我要向谋杀我孩子的人报仇。我报仇的手段会让最最勇敢的人看了也会发抖。 ”当他说这几句话的时候，他咬牙切，紧握住老人那只没有感觉的手。
